name: Nike Pegasus 41 GORE-TEX
description: A versatile running shoe designed for comfort and speed, featuring the Air Zoom cushioning technology.

name: Nike React Infinity Run Flyknit
description: Engineered for long runs with added cushioning to reduce injury and provide a soft, responsive feel.

name: Nike ZoomX Vaporfly Next% 2
description: A high-performance marathon shoe built for speed, designed with ZoomX foam and a carbon plate for added propulsion.

name: Nike ZoomX Invincible 3
description: A soft and bouncy shoe ideal for long, slow miles with exceptional cushioning and comfort.

name: Nike Vomero 17
description: A comfort-focused shoe designed for long runs and daily training, offering plush cushioning and stability.

name: Nike Air Zoom Terra Kiger 6
description: A lightweight and durable shoe designed for trail runners, offering excellent grip and support.

name: Nike G.T. Jump 2 EP
description: Known for its excellent cushioning and impact protection, ideal for players who need energy return and soft landings.

name: Nike Giannis Freak 6 EP
description: Lightweight and breathable, designed for a fast and agile playing style, with a responsive fit and Zoom Air cushioning.

name: Nike KD 16
description: A balanced shoe offering great comfort and support with Zoom Air cushioning, ideal for both offense and defense.

name: Nike Sabrina 2
description: Lightweight with great traction, designed for fast cuts and responsive movement on the court, with a stable grip.

name: Nike Air Zoom G.T. Cut 3
description: A shoe with ZoomX cushioning for a responsive and lightweight feel, designed for players requiring agility and quick movements.

name: Nike Air Force 1
description: A classic silhouette with a leather upper and a cushioned sole for everyday comfort and durability. The iconic design features clean lines and a sleek look, perfect for casual wear.

name: Nike Blazer Mid '77
description: A vintage-inspired shoe with retro basketball style. Features a leather and suede upper with a cushioned midsole for comfort and a rubber outsole for traction.

name: Nike Air Max 1
description: An iconic sneaker featuring the signature Air Max cushioning for all-day comfort. The sleek design pairs well with casual outfits and provides durability with a classic silhouette.

name: Nike SB Dunk Low
description: Originally designed for skateboarding, the SB Dunk Low has become a streetwear icon. It offers comfort with its padded collar and tongue, and the durable rubber outsole provides grip.

name: Nike Court Vision Low
description: Inspired by 1980s basketball shoes, this sneaker features a leather upper with a cushioned insole and rubber outsole, offering a sleek look with a nod to retro basketball culture.

name: Nike Metcon 8
description: The Nike Metcon 8 is designed for stability and support during intense workouts, from weightlifting to HIIT. It features a durable rubber outsole for traction and an updated mesh upper for breathability.

name: Nike Free Metcon 5
description: Built for flexibility and mobility, the Nike Free Metcon 5 is lightweight yet durable, with a flexible sole to support multi-directional movements. Ideal for athletes who engage in varied fitness routines.

name: Nike ZoomX SuperRep 3
description: Designed for high-intensity interval training (HIIT), the Nike ZoomX SuperRep 3 offers excellent cushioning and stability, allowing for explosive movements with maximum comfort.

name: Nike Air Zoom SuperRep 2
description: Featuring a responsive Zoom Air unit and a breathable upper, the Nike Air Zoom SuperRep 2 is optimized for short, high-intensity sessions. The shoe provides support for lateral movements and explosive jumps.

name: Nike React Metcon Turbo
description: The React Metcon Turbo offers a smooth and stable feel with a Nike React foam midsole. It combines durability with energy return, making it great for short sprints, lifts, and jumps.
